programme.title: Aliens Uncovered
programme.desc: With the recent release of Alien bodies at the Mexico disclosure event, we have to revisit the questions of alien visitation and the Mayan civilization. This doc explore an avenue you don't see on the popular shows.

programme.title: Conspiracy
programme.desc: Conspiracy is a video documentary series that explores the dark and controversial stories behind history's most well-known conspiracies. The series aims to take a neutral position on very polarizing topics while helping viewers uncover the truth.

programme.title: Unveiled
programme.desc: Embark on an enthralling journey with "Unveiled," a captivating TV series exploring the enigmatic world of aliens, UFOs, conspiracy theories, and extraterrestrial history. Each episode unveils astonishing encounters, hidden truths, and thought-provoking revelations that challenge reality itself. Discover a thrilling blend of scientific exploration, historical analysis, and captivating storytelling as "Unveiled" pushes the boundaries of human understanding and leaves audiences captivated by the mysteries of the universe.

programme.title: Is It Haunted?
programme.desc: This is part 2 of the teams investigation into Heskin Hall Shopping Village. Right from the get go, the team uncovered some interesting evidence. On this episode the team uncover lots of evidence! and explore the possibility of capturing a possible full apparition.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.desc: The second in a series of investigations into the phenomenon known as past life regression. Richard witnesses a municipal employee in Toronto, Canada undergo a regression during which he re-experiences a previous life as a doctor in early 20th. Century England.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension
programme.desc: Bex and Sean explore Gwrych Castle in Wales, renowned for its hauntings. Amid eerie voices, strange noises, and shadows, they use specialized equipment to unveil the spectral mysteries lurking within. Will they unearth Gwrych Castle's ghostly secrets?

programme.title: Ghost Cases
programme.desc: Paul and Holly visit one of the oldest courthouses and jails in North America as they investigate reports of a hooded specter and the possible spirit of an executed RAF Serviceman at the location.

programme.title: Ghost Cases
programme.desc: Paul and Holly investigate reports of paranormal activity at a private residence in Quinan, Nova Scotia where the home owners now fear living in their own house.

programme.title: Ghost Cases
programme.desc: Paul and Holly investigate the Fairmont Algonquin Resort to try and contact the ghost of a jilted bride in room 473.

programme.title: Ghost Cases
programme.desc: Have you ever eaten with the dead? Paul and Holly investigate a restaurant which may be haunted by the ghosts of a former funeral home. The location has an impressive history with ties to the popular Titanic and Halifax Explosion stories.

programme.title: Ghost Cases
programme.desc: Paul and Holly investigate a historic French fortress that witnessed two of the largest land and sea battles in North America. The fort may be haunted by the ghosts of its former inhabitants.

programme.title: Ghost Cases
programme.desc: Paul and Holly join a group of investigators from the UK. The White Hart Hotel is reported to be haunted by demonic activity while others have reported seeing the ghost of a playful little boy.

programme.title: Ghost Cases
programme.desc: Paul and Holly investigate a 12th century property near the historic village of Shocklach, England. Reports from this location include time portals, full bodied apparitions, light and sound anomalies.

programme.title: Ghost Cases
programme.desc: Paul and Holly visit a historic Inn while staying in Congleton, England. The ghost of a past owner may still haunt the cellar of the centuries old site.

programme.title: Ghost Cases
programme.desc: Paul and Holly investigate a popular and potentially haunted Manchester radio station and then spend the evening at a 10,000 year old burial site near Congleton, England where a ghostly Druid monk has been reportedly seen.

programme.title: Ghost Cases
programme.desc: Paul and Holly investigate the quintessential haunted mansion; it’s a century old private Inn that may still possess the spirit of its influential owner and his troubled niece.

programme.title: Ghost Cases
programme.desc: The Waverly Inn is a proud and historic Inn located in Halifax, Nova Scotia. Some guests have reportedly sensed the ghost of Oscar Wilde who visited in the late 1800’s.

programme.title: Ghost Cases
programme.desc: Holly and Paul investigate the private residence of a family that believes they share their home with the spirits of the original owners.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension
programme.sub-title: Gwrych Castle: Secrets of the Unknown
programme.desc: In the thrilling conclusion, Bex and Sean return to Gwrych Castle for intense paranormal investigations. Eerie chambers, mysterious apparitions, and chilling whispers await as they seek conclusive otherworldly proof. The secrets of this historic castle's ghostly past continue to tantalize.

programme.title: Paranormal Egypt: Pharaohs, Pyramids and Ancient Science
programme.sub-title: Paranormal Egypt: Pharaohs, Pyramids and Ancient Science - Part 2
programme.desc: In this documentary, discoveries by scientists and archaeologists give us revolutionary insight into the paranormal mysteries of Ancient Egypt.

programme.title: Is It Haunted?
programme.desc: Built in the late 17th century Bannockburn house has many links to Scottish history. Bonnie Prince Charlie’s Jacobite army camped within its grounds, while the prince found romance within its walls. Later on it was home to the family responsible for tartan production in Scotland and its sale and distribution across the world. A stone’s throw from the sites of clashes including the Battle of Bannockburn and the Bloody Fauld. Volunteers and workmen are said to have caught fleeting glimpses of shadows and movement while working here. The house presents you with feelings of being watched, silently from within. Reports of knocks, bangs, disconnected voices, apparitions feelings of sickness and sadness have all been documented. It is said by locals that this house is very much alive, it breaths it sleeps and connects with all that enter. Tonight the team will try to uncover its secrets. Welcome to is it haunted?

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.desc: Does the Bible contain hidden messages encoded within certain passages of the Old Testament? Is the prophetic nature of these 'codes' proof the Bible's author is of supernatural or extraterrestrial origin? Richard interviews several Bible Code researchers who explain why these codes are real, how they can be uncovered and decoded and what they mean for mankind.

programme.title: Aliens Uncovered
programme.sub-title: Aliens Uncovered: The Golden Record Part 1
programme.desc: In the late 1970s, the US government sent a message to our distant neighbors. Twenty years later, the response we received sparked the biggest UFO sighting in history.
